attributes.action: STEP ASIDE FOR THE GOOD OF THE COUNTRY
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Dissolve parliament and call elections. We are tired of lining the pockets on MP's and Civil servants on 6 Figure salaries. 

I like millions of other people struggle to pay the bills and get no help or have a pot to dip into when ever I like.

All the people in Favour Vote these CONMEN OUT.

Thank you.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
